column4: Good Morning.  I am kind of new to Linux haven't used it in 10 years or more.  I have a PIII with 256 RAM and it has an old copy of a different Linux operating system.  Do I need to figure out how to uninstall that or can I just put the CD in once I have downloaded and burnt it and go from there?
the install CD can reformat the drive if needed
and Cypher1: Thanks, nope no data needing to be backed up.  I just wasn't thrilled with the other and the computer teacher at my kids high school mentioned Ubuntu.  I'm making a Mom Only computer.
